医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
抗炎药可以通过抑制甜味受体来降低代谢疾病的风险过去的研究表明，人类的甜味受体传达了口腔中甜的感知，可能有助于调节整个体内的葡萄糖代谢。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/anti-infammatory-drugs-may-redugs-may-reduce-metabolic-disease---------------------- by by by by-by by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by-by the-weet-theweet-taste-taste-repeptor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/Anti-inflammatory-drugs-may-reduce-metabolic-disease-risk-by-inhibiting-the-sweet-taste-receptor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=906DB1A9-6EA9-45E4-9F45-F45-F82333EC555C13 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 21:18:44 -0400 Anti-inflammatory drugs may reduce metabolic disease risk by inhibiting the sweet taste receptor
衰老良好的最佳饮食，由100,000人进行了30年的研究支持一项针对100,000多名美国成年人的30年研究发现，对健康的饮食模式，尤其是AHEI的持续遵守与成功的衰老密切相关。富含植物性食物和健康脂肪的饮食，以及一些低脂动物产品，改善了身体，精神和认知健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/the-best-diet-for-aging-well-agging-well-backed-by-a-30-3年年度 - 100000 of-100000-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/the-best-diet-for-aging-well-aging-well-backed-by-a-30-30年 - 100000 of-100000-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e517f062-7223-4cb9-853c-141e6f3b3e3a Tue, 25 Mar 2025 21:18:00 -0400 The best diet for aging well, backed by a 30-year study of 100,000 people
新的开源工具可以识别衰老细胞以帮助抵抗慢性疾病对于人类健康，过早衰老的细胞是一个大问题。当细胞变老并停止生长时，其功能会改变，这会导致或恶化心血管疾病，阿尔茨海默氏病和其他慢性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/new-open-source-tool-indifies-cellis-gage-cells-cells-to-help-fight-fight-chronic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/new-open-source-tool-indifies-gage-cells-cells-cells-to-help-fight-chronic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f914828-CD0C-4838-B401-36EC2DFD459F Tue, 25 Mar 2025 21:12:36 -0400 New open-source tool identifies aging cells to help fight chronic diseases
C. DIFF使用有毒化合物在肠道中获得竞争优势病原体C. diff-医疗保健相关感染性腹泻的最常见原因 - 可以使用杀死人类肠道居民微生物生存和生长的化合物，在感染的肠道中具有竞争优势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/c-diff-uses-toxic-compound-compound-to-gain-competistival-competistival-advantage-in-the-gut.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/c-diff-uses-toxic-compound-compound-to-gain-competistival-competive-advantage-in-the-gut.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c96b1e2e-330d-4ebd-8fb2-8fb2-4705895858 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 21:07:06 -0400 C. diff uses toxic compound to gain competitive advantage in the gut
在宫颈癌细胞中发现的细胞相互作用的新型全球合作现象一个日本研究小组发现了宫颈癌细胞中细胞相互作用的一种新型的全球合作现象。他们的发现表明，这些细胞在功能网络中代谢连接。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/novel-global-cooperative-phenomena-phenomena of-cell-cell-interactions-intractions-incervical-cancercer-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/novel-global-cooperative-phenomena-phenomena of-cell-cell-interactions-interactions-incervical-incervical-cancerer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6E3F1758-CDFB-4167-B302-32F6A2054229 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 21:02:56 -0400 Novel global cooperative phenomena of cell interactions discovered in cervical cancer cells
靶向PCSK9和APOA4用于治疗TMAO诱导的胆石症胆固醇的合成和胆结石形成是由三甲胺-N-氧化物（TMAO）促进的，这是三甲胺的衍生物，这是肠道菌群的代谢产物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/targeting-pcsk9-and-apoa4-for-the-wareatment-tmao--诱导的胆碱症https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/targeting-pcsk9-and-apoa4-for-the-wareatment-tmao----诱导的golelelithiasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=E098D08E-9115-9115-41AB-9DFF-ACD95AE7C524 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 20:57:12 -0400 Targeting PCSK9 and APOA4 for the treatment of TMAO-induced cholelithiasis
川崎疾病的Cryptotanshinone可能是有希望的治疗选择宣布了Acta Materia Medica Journal的新出版物。川崎病（KD）是一种血管炎，主要影响儿童，并可能导致严重的心血管并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/cryptotanshinone-could-be-be-be-be-promising-therapeutic-therapeutic-option-for-kawasaki-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/cryptotanshinone-could-be-be-be-a-promising-therapeutic-therapeutic-option-for-kawasaki-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67662DBA-720A-418E-418E-9C71-0F2E71D63BF1 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 20:51:31 -0400 Cryptotanshinone could be a promising therapeutic option for Kawasaki disease
饮食习惯的简单变化可以帮助与肥胖症作斗争肥胖与许多健康并发症有关，包括糖尿病，心血管疾病和脂肪肝病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/simple-changes-in-habits-habits-could-help-fight-fight-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/simple-changes-in-habits-habits-could-help-fight-fight-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= e82b63b7-0553-4531-a85e-02b54444b0b2cc Tue, 25 Mar 2025 20:47:46 -0400 Simple changes in eating habits could help fight obesity
CDC研究确定了食源性疾病的主要罪魁祸首疾病预防控制中心和科罗拉多州公共卫生学院的研究人员估计，2019年，七个主要病原体在美国造成了990万个食源性疾病。诺如病毒引起了疾病和住院的计数，而沙门氏菌则导致死亡人数最多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/cdc-study-indistifies-leading-culprits-culprits-foodborne-illness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/cdc-study-indistifies-leading-culprits-culprits-foodborne-illness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db17e32f-6b5d-47cb-b350-767b34eaa03e Tue, 25 Mar 2025 20:39:00 -0400 CDC study identifies leading culprits of foodborne illness
研究发现，在怀孕期间喝饮食饮料会增加儿童超重风险怀孕期间人工甜味饮料（ASB）的日常消费与从7至18岁的后代中的超重风险持续增加有关。令人惊讶的是，尽管生活方式差异可能解释了这一点，但糖味的饮料（SSB）与较低的风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/drinking-diet-drinks-in-pregnancy-raises-cregnancy-cover-comperweight-chilk-in-child-children-children-children-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/drinking-diet-drinks-in-pregnancy-raises-raises-coverweight-cover-cover-complisk-in-child-children-children-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33ab071-7CE3-49A8-BCDA-7146618D8E3A Tue, 25 Mar 2025 20:00:00 -0400 Drinking diet drinks in pregnancy raises overweight risk in children, study finds
